headline: Atmos Energy Corporation Announces Retirement of Karen E. Hartsfield and Appointment of Jessica Bateman Pulliam to Senior Vice President, General Counsel and Corporate Secretary
summary: DALLAS, December 05, 2024--Atmos Energy Corporation (NYSE: ATO) announced today that Karen E. Hartsfield, currently Senior Vice President, General Counsel and Corporate Secretary, will retire in late 2025 after a distinguished career with the Company. She will serve in her current role until December 31, 2024, and then move into a Senior Advisor position, continuing to serve on the Company’s Management Committee.

headline: ONE Gas Stock Unveils 2025 and Long-Term Investment Plans
summary: OGS announces its long-term capital investment plan. Systematic investments will further strengthen infrastructure and allow OGS to meet its customer demands.
